segments.text: Yes , speaking . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am calling to check your information before the interview . What position did you apply ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am applying for the waiter in your pub .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Excuse me . Could you slow down a little ? I couldn't catch you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . I will try my best to slow down .
segments.speaker: S2
